name: Road To Eden - survival coop
summary: Road to Eden is a third-person multiplayer survival coop game, set within the post-apocalyptic ruins of a world destroyed by an alien invasion. You wake up at the side of the road with no memory and must team up with other survivors to make the long and dangerous journey to Eden.
storyline:
Road to Eden is set within the post-apocalyptic ruins of a world destroyed by an alien invasion. 99% of the human population were wiped out in an instant and now humanity’s last hope is Project Eden, a base of operation where the remaining survivors are fighting back. You wake up at the side of the road with no memory and must team up with other survivors to make the long and dangerous journey to Eden. 
 
Features: 
 
Third person Multiplayer Survival 4 players CO-OP 
Crafting 
Building 
Random Dungeons 
Fight 4 factions with multiple sub classes - Infected, Rebels, Paramilitary and the visitors 
Open world 
Random loot 
Explore the secret caves scattered around the map and get rare items 
Fast travel to random missions 
World events
